reviews.review_msg: His sooo nice!!! his lecture notes are veryy good!! if you read his lecture notes you'll do good on the exams~~however i dont like the fact that the lecture notes are soo colourful...waste so much ink...but other than that..his' awesome
New teacher and great guy. He has a passion for his subject so he wants to see you succeed. French accent can be a little hard to understand sometimes, but his powerpoint lectures are good.
